name: Jungle Bubble
description:
shoot a ball to hit the same color ball, eliminate if 3-match.
[4 pets, 4 different skills, make full use of pet help to pass level]
[save fruits feeding pets spirit to upgrade, enhancing the magic]

= game tips=
* the jungle brothers and sisters will get special pet spirit’s help, make full use of them
* the little monkey can help you to eliminate fruits
* the little penguin, can freeze all fruits for several senconds
* the cute little wizard, can keep out all the fruits for a short distance.
